articles.author: Darren Allan
articles.title: Windows 11's next big update could arrive in February 2024, packing some nifty features – but it might miss some tricks too - TechRadar
articles.description: Moment 5 will introduce useful new features, but some of the best bits might only come to European users
articles.content:
Windows 11 could be getting its next feature drop early in 2024, courtesy of what will be the fifth ‘Moment’ update for the operating system.
As you’re likely aware by now, a Moment is the name give… [+4160 chars]
